trans-unit.source: Represents a pop-up menu that enables a control to expose functionality that is specific to the context of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示使控件能够公开特定于控件的上下文的功能的弹出菜单。

trans-unit.source: ContextMenu is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: ContextMenu 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，这意味着它可以包含的任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板） 的对象的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: The properties of the ContextMenu class are used to define the position and behavior of the ContextMenu.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenu 类的属性用于定义的位置和 ContextMenu 行为。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> can have a ContextMenu.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>可以 ContextMenu。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: If you assign a ContextMenu to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> class handles context menu operations in response to user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将分配到 ContextMenu<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>类处理以响应用户交互的上下文菜单操作。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Part of the work the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> does is opening the ContextMenu when the user clicks the right mouse button over the control.
trans-unit.target: 工作的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>未正在打开 ContextMenu，当用户单击鼠标右键按钮位于控件上方。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>

trans-unit.source: The following properties are defined by the ContextMenu and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> classes.
trans-unit.target: 由 ContextMenu 定义以下属性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>

trans-unit.source: If any of these properties are set on both ContextMenu and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>, the property value from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果在这两个 ContextMenu 上设置这些属性中的任何和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>，属性值从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>使用。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTargetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow%2A> A ContextMenu is automatically placed inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTargetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow%2A>ContextMenu 自动放置在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTargetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: This behavior cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 不能更改此行为。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ContextMenu Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ContextMenu controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenu 控件到自定义适用于多个 ContextMenu 控件，使用的相同的属性设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控制。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ContextMenu, see [ContextMenu Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于 ContextMenu 状态，请参阅[ContextMenu 样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ContextMenu control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在 ContextMenu 控件的默认模板中，通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a particular instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> closes.
trans-unit.target: 时发生的特定实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>关闭。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a callback that indicates where a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> should be placed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指示在何处的回调<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>应该放置在屏幕上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> for the callback delegate to be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>属性必须设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>为要使用的回调委托。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback> delegate returns an array of possible points that are defined with respect to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback>委托返回的可能的点方面<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>定义数组</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback>

trans-unit.source: When the context menu is displayed, a point is chosen that maximizes the amount of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> window that is visible.
trans-unit.target: 当显示上下文菜单时，来最大化量选中了一点<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>是可见的窗口。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The behavior is the same as it is for the popup.
trans-unit.target: 按原样弹出窗口，行为都是相同的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Specify a Custom Popup Position](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Popup Placement Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 指定的自定义弹出位置](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[弹出窗口放置示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032)。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A callback that specifies the location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的位置的回调<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control supports scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否支持滚动。

trans-unit.source: If the control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in its style and has a custom keyboard scrolling behavior, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> should return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>其样式和具有自定义键盘滚动行为，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A>应返回`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the context menu appears with a dropped shadow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否有投影出现上下文菜单。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> opens, the value is set to the value of <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>打开时，值设置为<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的值</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`true`如果不起作用<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是`false`。</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the context menu appears with a dropped shadow; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用投影，则为显示的上下文菜单否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目标原点和弹出项对齐的水平距离点。

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, HorizontalOffset, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>，HorizontalOffset，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性的行为是相同的一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>一样

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[弹出项放置行为](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None | # # XAML 属性用法``` - or – ``` # # XAML 值*double* 的字符串表示形式值。

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 它被解释为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字符串不需要显式包括位小数。

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值的`1`是可以接受的。

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply.
trans-unit.target: 相同<xref:System.Double>属性值部分中所述的范围限制也适用。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *double*该值，上文所述跟以下单位声明字符串之一︰ `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px **Note** In many cases a double may be set to Auto but a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> will not appear if the offsets are set to Auto.
trans-unit.target: `px`（默认值） 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]`in`为英寸; 1 英寸 = = 96px`cm`是厘米; 1cm==(96/2.54) px`pt`是点; 1pt==(96/72) px**注意**在许多情况下一个双精度值可以设置为自动，但<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>如果偏移量设置为 Auto.将不会出现</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 目标原点 popup 对齐点之间的水平距离。

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关目标原点和弹出项对齐点的信息，请参阅[弹出项放置行为](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>可见。

trans-unit.source: When IsOpen is set to `true`, mouse capture is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> and its subtree.
trans-unit.target: 当 IsOpen 设置为`true`，鼠标捕获设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>及其子树。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>可见; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 时调用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref>事件发生。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 报告<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*>

trans-unit.target: 时调用<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown"></xref>中的对象引发事件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.target: 响应<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"></xref> event occurs.

trans-unit.target: 当打开上下文菜单的特定实例时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Placement property of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的放置属性<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> changes this value of this property when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> opens.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>分配给<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>更改此属性的这个值时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>打开。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If the user opens the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by using the mouse, Placement is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户打开<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>使用鼠标，放置设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If the user opens the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by using the keyboard, Placement is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户打开<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>通过使用键盘，放置设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要更改的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>，设置此<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>位置

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, Placement, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>，放置， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性的行为是相同的一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>一样

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[弹出项放置行为](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the area relative to which the context menu is positioned when it opens.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置相对于其上下文菜单位于在打开时的区域。

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, PlacementRectangle, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>。</xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> relative to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> is positioned when it opens.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>相对于其<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>位于在打开时。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> changes this value of this property to the owning <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> opens.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>分配给<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>更改此属性的这个值为拥有<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>打开。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: To use a different <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用不同<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.

trans-unit.target: 指定的项。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果菜单应保持打开状态，除非<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>属性更改为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None | # # XAML 属性用法``` - or – ``` # # XAML 值*double* 的字符串表示形式值。

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 它被解释为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字符串不需要显式包括位小数。

trans-unit.source: For instance, a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值`1`是可以接受的。

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply.
trans-unit.target: 相同<xref:System.Double>属性值部分中所述的范围限制也适用。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *double*该值，上文所述跟以下单位声明字符串之一︰ `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px > [!NOTE] > In many cases a double may be set to Auto, but a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> does not appear if the offsets are set to Auto.
trans-unit.target: `px`（默认值） 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]`in`为英寸; 1 英寸 = = 96px`cm`是厘米; 1cm==(96/2.54) px`pt`是点; 1pt==(96/72) px 1> [!NOTE] 1> 在许多情况下一个双精度值可以设置为自动，但<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>如果偏移量设置为 Auto.不显示</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 目标原点 popup 对齐点之间的垂直距离。

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关目标原点和弹出项对齐点的信息，请参阅[弹出项放置行为](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffset*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffset*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
